job_description: Web DeveloperSeeking talented and prolific javascript developer to work on cutting-edge developer dashboards, and real-time analytics apps in the games space. Should be willing to push the envelope of current browsers and HTML5 to develop engaging and compelling user experiences.Responsibilities• Develop and architect complex real-time and non-real-time javascript applications• Develop reusable javascript modules, packages• Optimize, tune and performance-test javascript• Experiment with server-side javascript, node.js modules
job_requirements: Qualifications & Desired Skills• BS, MS, or PhD in Computer Science or equivalent• Commanding knowledge of Javascript and CoffeeScript: prototype, events, threads, DOM manipulation• Experience with multiple javascript frameworks: Angular, Meteor, jQuery, Dojo, Mootools, SproutCore, ExtJS• Experience with web tools: grunt, bower, sass, less, etc.• Strong HTTP / REST knowledge• Experience with caching layers: ETAGS, browser cache• Strong experience with browser developer tools, e.g. Firebug, Chrome DevTools• Experience with ajax communication styles: post, get, long-poll, comet, websocketsOpen To All Majors:No
